movie.title: Schism
movie.description_intro: The tale of a man trapped on the Shores of Hell and the inner demons he must face to escape.
movie.description_full: The tale of a man trapped on the Shores of Hell and the inner demons he must face to escape.

movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.summary: When his parents are killed, billionaire playboy Bruce Wayne relocates to Asia, where he is mentored by Henri Ducard and Ra's Al Ghul in how to fight evil. When learning about the plan to wipe out evil in Gotham City by Ducard, Bruce prevents this plan from getting any further and heads back to his home. Back in his original surroundings, Bruce adopts the image of a bat to strike fear into the criminals and the corrupt as the icon known as "Batman". But it doesn't stay quiet for long.

Back in his original surroundings, Bruce adopts the image of a bat to strike fear into the criminals and the corrupt as the icon known as "Batman". But it doesn't stay quiet for long.

movies.title: Little Boy
movies.summary: Little Pepper Busbee (Jakob Salvati) enjoys an idyllic life in an American small town, but his world is shattered when his beloved father (Michael Rapaport) is sent off to fight in World War II. But a chance encounter with a stage magician (Ben Chaplin) awakens his dormant abilities and clues him into the power of faith. Now his devotion to his father will extend past time and space and into the realm of miracles..

movies.title: Black Mountain Poets
movies.summary: Claire and Lisa Walker are neurotic sisters on the run who assume the identities of Internationally renowned poets The Wilding Sisters to take refuge at a Poetry Retreat for the weekend; spending time in the black mountains of Wales amongst poets and the inspiration of nature leads to a new beginning for our heroines.

movies.title: After Blue
movies.summary: We are more than we perceive. Energy made visible when death stares at us up close.
movies.description_full: We are more than we perceive. Energy made visible when death stares at us up close.
